# anchored

**Type Property**

Search is limited to start (or end, if searching backwards) of the data object.

## Declaration

```swift
static var anchored: NSData.SearchOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

This option performs searching only on bytes at the beginning of the range (or the end when using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSData/SearchOptions/backwards]). No match at the beginning or end means nothing is found, even if a matching sequence of bytes occurs elsewhere in the data object.

## Constants

- **backwards**: Search from the end of the data object.

items.description: Search from the end of the data object.
items.name: backwards

title: anchored
